title: Blog admin image/date fields and ordering fixes
scope: Expose featured image and published date fields in the blog admin editor.
Persist featured image and published date values through admin blog endpoints.
Order public blog listings by published date with a created date fallback.
Ensure admin modal actions remain accessible on smaller viewports.
Support uploading a featured image from the blog admin editor.
Remove the /blog admin overlay and rely on the dashboard admin experience.
Replace the blog editor textarea with a rich text editor that supports uploads and media embeds.
acceptance_criteria: Blog admin create/edit form includes featured image and published date fields.
Admin blog create/update endpoints store featured image and published date values when provided.
Public blog listings sort by published date and gracefully fall back to created date when missing.
Blog admin modal remains scrollable with visible submit controls on small screens.
Blog admin editor can upload a featured image and store the resulting URL on the post.
The /blog overlay no longer shows a Blog Admin view or entry point.
Blog post create/edit uses a rich text editor with image uploads and media embeds.
risk_notes: Datetime parsing could reject unexpected formats if the admin UI sends invalid values.
Ordering changes may affect how legacy posts are displayed when dates are missing.
rollback_plan: Revert the blog admin UI and backend endpoint changes and remove the workorder entry.
